overview: On her journey to the United States, Marya Nisko falls in love with another immigrant, Sascha Rabinoff. Arriving and discovering her sister's poverty, she fails as a lady's maid and then arranges an introduction to a theatrical manager, though Sascha is opposed to her becoming a professional dancer.
tagline: A Clean Powerful Picture, which You Owe it to Yourself and family to See
title: The Land of Hope
